contest-event.event-date:
May 24, 2014 D Band Cymru
Band Cymru - Final 0 Entertainments Contest Band Cymru - Finals band-cymru
Wales Millennium Centre, Cardiff, Cardiff County, Wales, UK 1st Edition
Contest for Jazz, Wind and Brass -Bands, presented by S4C Broadcasting (Cymru = Wales). Competition for places in the final rounds of Band Cymru 2014 has been fierce with more than 50 entries from groups of every size and from every corner of the country. Following a series of auditions held at venues across Wales, 12 bands have been selected to go through to the finals.
also Finalist: Capital City Jazz Orchestra Winner: Cory Band, got Prize Money of Â£10000 (not Entry allowed for a next Edition)
